entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
